title: Indian restaurant website with reservations and admin-managed menu

requirements.text: Create a multi-page Indian restaurant website with the following pages and navigation: Home, Menu, About Us, Gallery, Online Reservation, Contact. Ensure navigation works on desktop and mobile (responsive).

quotes: Create a full Indian restaurant website with Home, Menu, About Us, Gallery, Online Reservation Form, and Contact pages.

acceptanceCriteria: Top-level navigation links exist for Home, Menu, About Us, Gallery, Online Reservation, and Contact.
Each route/page renders distinct page content and matches its menu label.
Layout is responsive (mobile menu or stacked navigation on small screens).

requirements.text: Apply a modern, clean, cohesive visual theme appropriate for an Indian restaurant (warm, inviting palette; consistent typography; consistent spacing; accessible contrast). Do not use a blue/purple-dominant palette.

quotes: Include sections for special dishes, customer reviews, opening hours, location, and a modern clean design.

acceptanceCriteria: All pages share a consistent header/footer and typographic system.
Primary/secondary button styles and section headings are consistent across pages.
Color palette is warm/neutral and not dominated by blue/purple.

requirements.text: Home page: add sections for (1) hero headline and short description, (2) special dishes (highlighted items), (3) customer reviews/testimonials, (4) opening hours, and (5) location summary with address text.

quotes: Include sections for special dishes, customer reviews, opening hours, location

acceptanceCriteria: Home page includes all five specified sections with clear headings.
Special dishes section shows at least 3 highlighted dishes with name, short description, and price.
Customer reviews section shows at least 3 reviews with reviewer name and rating display (e.g., stars).
Opening hours section displays a weekly schedule (at minimum: days + times).
Location section displays the address exactly as provided (including punctuation/case).

requirements.text: Menu page: display menu items grouped by category (e.g., Starters, Main Course, Breads, Desserts, Beverages). Each item shows name, description, price, and optional vegetarian/non-vegetarian indicator.

quotes: Menu... and a simple admin section to update menu items.

acceptanceCriteria: Menu items render from backend data (not hardcoded only in frontend).
Menu supports at least 4 categories and displays items grouped by category.
Each item displays name, description, and price.
UI indicates veg/non-veg when present on an item.

requirements.text: About Us page: include restaurant story/description content, cuisine focus, and a short section highlighting quality/ingredients/hospitality. Ensure content is in English and matches an Indian restaurant context (no placeholder lorem ipsum).
acceptanceCriteria: About page has at least 2â€“3 paragraphs of meaningful English content (no lorem ipsum).
Page includes at least one highlighted block (e.g., 'Our Story' / 'Our Promise').

requirements.text: Gallery page: display a grid of restaurant/food images with a click-to-view larger preview (modal/lightbox).
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays a grid of at least 8 images.
Clicking an image opens a larger preview and can be closed.
Gallery is responsive and maintains consistent spacing.

requirements.text: Online Reservation page: implement a reservation form that collects at minimum: full name, phone number, date, time, number of guests, and optional notes. Validate required fields client-side and submit to backend for storage.
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes: name, phone, date, time, guests, notes (optional).
Required fields are validated and show inline error messages before submission.
Successful submission persists a reservation record in the backend and shows a success confirmation state.
If backend call fails, user sees a non-technical error message and can retry.

requirements.text: Contact page: display restaurant details including phone number 8742895627 and address "-15, Rani bazar Jaipur". Also include opening hours and a simple location section (text-based).

quotes: Add restaurant details, phone number 8742895627, address -15, Rani bazar Jaipur

acceptanceCriteria: Contact page shows phone number exactly: 8742895627.
Contact page shows address exactly: -15, Rani bazar Jaipur.
Contact page includes an opening hours block and a location block (text-based).

requirements.text: Backend: create data models and stable storage for (a) menu categories/items and (b) reservations. Provide query/update methods needed by the frontend to list menu items, and create reservations.

quotes: Online Reservation Form... simple admin section to update menu items.

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes a query method to fetch menu categories/items for public display.
Backend exposes an update method to create a reservation entry from the reservation form.
Data is stored in stable structures so it persists across canister upgrades (use stable variables).

requirements.text: Admin section (UI + backend): create a simple admin area that allows an authenticated admin to add, edit, and delete menu categories/items (including name, description, price, category, veg/non-veg flag, and optional image reference). Use Internet Identity authentication and restrict admin methods so only authorized principals can modify menu data.

quotes: a simple admin section to update menu items.

acceptanceCriteria: Admin area is accessible from the UI (e.g., in footer or a dedicated route) and is clearly labeled as admin.
Admin actions include: create, update, delete menu items and manage categories.
Unauthenticated users cannot access admin editing controls (they may see a prompt to sign in).
Backend rejects menu-modifying calls from non-admin principals.
At least one admin principal can be configured (e.g., initial admin set to the first principal who initializes, or a constant allowlist) and is documented in code comments/config.

requirements.text: Seed initial content: include a reasonable default set of Indian menu items (at least 12 items across categories) and at least 3 special dishes and 3 reviews so the site is not empty on first load.

quotes: Include sections for special dishes, customer reviews...

acceptanceCriteria: Fresh deploy shows populated Menu with at least 12 items across multiple categories.
Home page special dishes section is populated without admin input.
Home page reviews section displays at least 3 reviews on first load.

requirements.text: Add generated static images as frontend assets and use them across the website (home hero, logo, and gallery images). Store them under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend (do not route images through the backend).
acceptanceCriteria: All required generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Home page uses the hero image and logo in the UI.
Gallery page uses the generated gallery images and loads them as static assets.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (all logic in backend/main.mo).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths; compose those components instead.
Authentication must use Internet Identity (no third-party auth providers).
Use English for all user-facing text.
nonGoals: Domain purchase/automatic custom domain hosting setup.
Real-time table availability, live chat, SMS/WhatsApp confirmations, or email integrations.
Online payments or food ordering checkout flow.
Map/GPS integration (only text-based location is required).

required: Restaurant logo mark, minimal modern Indian-inspired iconography (restaurant-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Warm modern hero banner featuring an Indian dining/food scene with clean negative space (home-hero-banner.dim_1600x900.png)
Food photography-style image of a signature curry dish (dish-signature-curry.dim_1000x750.png)
Food photography-style image of tandoori platter (dish-tandoori-platter.dim_1000x750.png)
Close-up plated Indian dish photo-style image (gallery-02.dim_1200x800.png)

preferencesToAdd: Use English for user-facing website content.
miscToAdd: Restaurant contact details to display: phone 8742895627; address "-15, Rani bazar Jaipur".
